TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit InvalidCommandTreeException extends System.Data.DataException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown to indicate that a command tree is invalid. This exception is currently not thrown anywhere in the Entity Framework.
